about-self/evolution.title: The Evolution Of Technology
about-self/evolution.description: Technology is evolving in two main directions; towards more centralised control, or towards decentralised, democratic, user-control. Humanity is at a crossroads and everyone has a choice:

about-self/long-term.title: The Long-Term Goal
about-self/long-term.description: Over the decades to come, the ultimate goal is to create and maintain a sustainable, aesthetically coherent, secure, privacy-conscious and productivity-optimised operating system that is of tremendous value to the world; simplifying life for individuals and positively impacting industry in the process. This is the SELF Operating System (SELF OS).

about-self/manifesto.title: Manifesto
about-self/manifesto.description: The first article of the United Nations Universal Declaration of Human Rights states the following: "All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights."

about-self/self-sov-alternative.title: A Self-Sovereign Alternative
about-self/self-sov-alternative.description: An ethically anchored philosophy that puts the user front and centre should be the fundamental basis for designing an operating system of the future. Such a system should not put an excessive focus on monetising its users and their data, but instead give users full control over their information. Users should have data privacy by default and be able to decide what to share and what to keep private.

about-self/the-story.title: The Story
about-self/the-story.description: The Problem: Our Digital Lives Are No Longer Our Own

building-on-self/developer-incentives.title: Developer Incentives
building-on-self/developer-incentives.description: We intend to reward developers and teams who build on our cutting-edge, privacy-first, and AI-powered infrastructure.

building-on-self/developer-integration.title: Developer Integration Guide
building-on-self/developer-integration.description: This guide describes the PLANNED developer integration for SELF Chain. The features, APIs, and SDKs described here do not exist yet. This is a design specification for future implementation.

building-on-self/getting-started.title: SDK Preparation Guide
building-on-self/getting-started.description: The SELF SDK and MCP integration described in this documentation are planned but not yet released. Code examples shown are specifications that will work when the SDK is deployed.

building-on-self/index.title: Developer Guide Overview
building-on-self/index.description: Welcome to the developer guide for building applications on SELF Chain! This section covers everything you need to know about creating AI-native apps that harness SELF's revolutionary blockchain platform.

building-on-self/mcp-integration.title: SELF MCP
building-on-self/mcp-integration.description: The SELF MCP SDK and integration described in this documentation is planned but not yet released. The code examples and features shown are specifications only and will not work until the SDK is deployed.

index.title: SELF Documentation - The Future Of Technology Is Yours
index.description: SELF documentation - Build with the people's technology platform featuring SELF Chain blockchain with Proof-of-AI consensus, post-quantum cryptography, and human-centric design. Open-source infrastructure for self-sovereign technology, privacy-first applications, and decentralized AI validation.

project-status/index.title: Project Status - Current State of SELF

roadmap/beta-web-app.title: Beta Web App
roadmap/beta-web-app.description: The purpose of the Beta Web App was to simply test the agentic experience where SELF learned about each user during conversations (likes, dislikes, traits, habits, places you've been, goals, dreams etc.), and generated a user profile.

roadmap/Introduction.title: Introduction
roadmap/Introduction.description: The blockchain world must offer a user experience that surpasses centralised platforms in every area. This requires a holistic approach, where functionality and decentralisation benefits go hand-in-hand. User experience needs to be front and centre. Most blockchain projects are isolated islands, not part of a unified and functioning ecosystem. There are certainly many unification and interoperability efforts ongoing, but weâ€™ve yet to see a solution in the form of an operating system that glues it all together. Nor an operating system, outside of the usual suspects, that is beautiful to use. In our view, any player in the space who wishes to scale an alternative vision needs to embrace a holistic and unified approach with outstanding user experience.

roadmap/self-os.title: Operating System
roadmap/self-os.description: SELF OS will work similarly to a typical operating system in terms of having numerous applications that assist with various tasks, from communication to note-taking and scheduling to purchasing. However, all the innate applications will be linked to one another by each userâ€™s SELF AI, meaning that their individual preferences are part of how the applications work. Any external application that makes such interactions possible will also be integrated. This will enable an entirely new experience of interacting with an operating system.

roadmap/super-app-testnet.title: Super-App & SELF Chain Testnet
roadmap/super-app-testnet.description: The Super-App will run on the SELF Chain Testnet and each user's profile will be an individual node on the network, running their own private AI. The initial features will be:

roadmap/Token/Smart-Contract-Architectur.title: SELF Token Smart Contract Architecture
roadmap/Token/Smart-Contract-Architectur.description: This document describes planned smart contract architecture. Implementation details are subject to change and should not be used for development until official release.

roadmap/Token/Tokenomics.title: SELF Tokenomics
roadmap/Token/Tokenomics.description: The SELF Token ($SELF) is the core utility and governance token of the SELF ecosystem. It powers the upcoming super-app, future SELF-related products (whether developed in-house or by external teams), the SELF Constellation, and SELF Chain governance. Designed for long-term sustainability and value accrual, $SELF enables network operations, rewards participation, and incentivizes ecosystem growth.

technical-docs/Constellation/Overview.title: Constellation Overview & Architecture
technical-docs/Constellation/Overview.description: Configure Your Own AI-Powered Layer-1 Blockchain

technical-docs/Performance/Advanced_TPS_.title: Advanced TPS Optimization
technical-docs/Performance/Advanced_TPS_.description: The metrics described in this document represent theoretical performance optimization targets and architectural design goals, not achieved performance. These are aspirational targets based on our planned architecture.

technical-docs/PoAI/ai-block-builder-alg.title: AI Block Builder Algorithm
technical-docs/PoAI/ai-block-builder-alg.description: Block builders are full blockchain nodes that store ready-made blocks of the blockchain and participate in forming and packaging new blocks. The block builder's basis is a Machine Learning (ML) model, which has the initial, specified parameters of the methodology for forming effective blocks from existing mempool transactions.

technical-docs/PoAI/ai-validator-algorit.title: AI-Validator Algorithm
technical-docs/PoAI/ai-validator-algorit.description: AI validators are lite blockchain nodes that store network wallet addresses and color markers. Color markers are a key part of validation and connecting a block to the blockchain:

technical-docs/PoAI/color-marker-system.title: Color Marker System
technical-docs/PoAI/color-marker-system.description: The Color Marker System is a unique cryptographic validation mechanism in SELF Chain's Proof of AI (PoAI) consensus that provides an additional layer of security and state tracking for wallet addresses and transactions.

technical-docs/PoAI/Proof-of-AI.title: Proof-of-AI
technical-docs/PoAI/Proof-of-AI.description: We have developed a novel consensus mechanism known as Proof-of-AI (PoAI), enabling SELF Chain's decentralized validation and security. This section details the PoAI methodology.

technical-docs/PoAI/Taxonomy.title: Taxonomy
technical-docs/PoAI/Taxonomy.description: This document defines the core terminology and data structures used in the Proof-of-AI (PoAI) consensus mechanism. Understanding these components is essential for implementing and interacting with SELF Chain's AI-driven validation system.

technical-docs/PoAI/the-incentive.title: The Incentive
technical-docs/PoAI/the-incentive.description: The reward for participation is generated as a native coin, earned by helping to assemble a new block among participants in the consensus process. An example reward distribution is as follows:

technical-docs/PoAI/validation-process.title: Validation Process
technical-docs/PoAI/validation-process.description: AI validators participate in every vote to determine the block builder with each new round of block assembly. The AI validator votes independently, without user intervention, in the background. The AI validator's artificial intelligence model is being trained based on the results of previous voting and analysis of the participants' block builders' parameters, as well as the requested manual votes of the AI validator's owner.

technical-docs/PoAI/voting-algorithm.title: Voting Algorithm
technical-docs/PoAI/voting-algorithm.description: The PoAI mechanism organizes voting and cannot directly influence its results or participate in voting. It will have an identical ML model internally to that of the block builder and generate its own version of the block with each new round of assembly.
